page.title: 06Famous Connections
page.content:
Station Road is the main shopping road in Rossett. Here was the original primary school. The site is now a car park. Nearby is the Spar supermarket. This has taken the place of a separate post office and village shop.
The railway station has been closed but there is a manned level crossing where the Wrexham-Chester line crosses the road to Llay. Nearby is a reserved area of track where the Royal Train stays overnight when a member of the Royal Family makes a visit to the North Wales area.
A large house on the main raod through Rossett was the home of Russ Abbott before he moved to London. He is a famous comedian.
